name: Darkwaronline
storyline:
As you level up you will get new skills and you can use new weapons and equipment...
Find items from 1 to 6 stars with 6 stars being the best items for the character's inventory
Send the objects by mail to your other characters or if you are playing on a network send by mail using the names of those characters...
Eliminate the enemies reaches level 90 fill yourself with the best objects. Visual Basic 6.0
summary: Darkwaronline is a sci-fi RPG game the game was designed mainly as MMORPG where you drive your chosen robot, it can be manually or with the automated combat system.
